caption.title: Territory of the Wallis and Futuna Islands.
caption.p: (A) Location of the Territory of the Wallis and Futuna Islands in the South Pacific represented by the red spot. (B) Map of Wallis and Futuna showing the three main islands: Wallis (78 km 2) to the northeast, Futuna (46 km 2) and Alofi (18 km 2) to the southwest. Open source maps from USGS LandsatLook ( https://landsatlook.usgs.gov/viewer.html) annotated with Adobe Photoshop 8.0.1.
